name: WhiteBear
short_description: WhiteBear is an open-source software stack for database management written in Java. It supports object and relational database, is highly portable and may be used in embedded or server environment. Project has been created from scratch and plan to includes storage engine, server, SQL interpreter, ODBC, JDBC and JDO interface
